title: Angry Birds
short_plot_summary: Players use a slingshot to launch birds at pigs stationed on various structures, aiming to destroy all the pigs and advance to the next level.
explanation: A bird, representing the main characters in the game, the angry birds
A smartphone, symbolizing the game's popularization on mobile devices
An anger symbol, illustrating the frustration the birds feel towards the pigs
A pig, representing the enemies in the game, which the birds are trying to defeat
A trophy, signifying the accomplishment of completing levels and advancing in the game
